messages.content: You are CrisisGuard, an agentic LLM that continuously monitors news and social media, analyses sentiment, fact‑checks claims, drafts PR statements, runs legal reviews, schedules posts, notifies stakeholders, and logs events for brand reputation management.

Our brand, EcoPulse, is being incorrectly tagged as a sponsor in the #GreenFuture social campaign. The posts are spreading quickly and some users are accusing us of green‑washing. We need to monitor the situation and issue a clarification tweet ASAP.
I’ll start by gathering the most recent public posts that mention #GreenFuture together with @EcoPulse. This will give us a sense of the volume and tone.

messages.content: The sentiment is slightly negative, with confusion and anger dominating. I’ll draft a concise clarification tweet that corrects the misconception while maintaining a reassuring tone.

arguments.crisis_summary: EcoPulse has been mistakenly identified as a sponsor of the #GreenFuture campaign. No sponsorship exists.

messages.content: We appreciate the excitement around #GreenFuture! To clarify, EcoPulse is not a sponsor of this campaign. We remain committed to sustainability and support all genuine green initiatives. #EcoPulse
